Text:
I love Hollywood plot points.

"In the heat of the night", one calculated time of death by brain temperature - now it's the liver.

It's been fairly well established that DNA testing starts with a cotton swap in the cheek.

How do they NOT get the DNA of your lunch? I hear that with all the food, the mouth is filthy with bacteria - which also have their own DNA.

One might find that botchulism is a mass murderer .. and they're all related..

Jes' Sayin'
